column4: How can I get linux on a machine with no option to boot from usb or optical drive??
nope, unfortunately the bios doesnt allow
and my dvd drive is fooked!
your not, I've seen you in here before.
i joined yesterday under the alias peco1
thats interesting my irc logs show the user Peeco from the BT address range your on being in here over the last month
that is strange, as i only just began investigating ubuntu yesterday!!
I strongly advise you not to do that
that install will not be supported by the ubuntu community
because that is not an ubuntu install method so it's results will not be supported
why is the guide in the ubuntu community documentation?
because that is community solution, not an official ubuntu solution
I don't rate the method personally, but thats my personal opinion
